Ask HN: What Happened to Theregister.com?
text:
Asking here because I think there is probably a lot of overlap and maybe some knowledgeable insiders.

I used to visit The Register almost every day up until a few years ago. Back then, it was famous for its punny headlines, tongue-in-cheek reporting style, and all in all being a self-identified IT tabloid.

I visited it again a week or two ago, and it seems to have dropped the humourous tone and intentionally-obscure headlines, to become just one more samey IT news page.

Does anybody know what caused this transformation? Has it been acquired by a conglomerate or something? The nearest thing I've found is that its original Chief Editor left in May 2019...

Show HN: Guided inpainting with Stable Diffusion using DiffusionUI
text:
I made a web interface fronted using Vue to have a nice interface for text-to-image, image-to-image, and inpainting.

It allows doing image-to-image inside an inpainting region!

Demo video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AFZvW5qURes

GitHub: https://github.com/leszekhanusz/diffusion-ui

Gif: https://github.com/leszekhanusz/diffusion-ui/raw/main/doc/cu...

title: What to do with everything that we created if the startup no longer exists?
text: Over the past two years, our team has spent a really long time writing code and developing infrastructure for our project. But due to problems with investments, our company stopped working. What can we do with everything we have created? Are there platforms where we can try to sell it to other teams? Or is it possible to do something else? Folks, please tell us about your experience!
